response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 15000}
